com.wove

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wove.Card

  • class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a standard playing card.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        determines if the card is face up or face down. Face up is visible. All cards will be face up in this game except for the dealer's first card.
        Returns:
        if the card is face up

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility(boolean visible)
        sets whether the card is face up (visible) or face down (not visible)
        Parameters:
        visible - if the card should be visible

      • getMinValue

        public int getMinValue()
        gets the smallest value this card can represent. for aces it returns 1
        Returns:
        the smallest value this card can represent. for aces it returns 1
